txt.en: Defeat the leader of the northern waves
Defeat the leader of the Western waves
Thrastar is a Dourhand of the most vile disposition. Defeating him is a favour to Durin's Folk.
Hergill is one of the captains of the Dourhands sent to lay siege to the fortress of Gondamon.
The fortress of Gondamon is one of the greatest strongholds of the Longbeards in the Blue Mountains.
Agi Gatebreaker is thus named because of his ability to lead forces to tear down the gates of defended fortresses.
Gashnákh was sent to burn down the Gondamon, but he did not succeed, thanks to you.
Sigurmar, using evil weapons of destruction, seeks to undermine the strength of Gondamon.
